snippet: The Division of Environmental Health Services, whose members were at the Inland Regional Center when the shooting took place, will be closed for at least another week.
abstract: County offices near disability center where mass shooting occurred reopen in San Bernardino, Calif; local public health official promises in poignant press conference that her family-like organization will defy fear; local doctors recount working through strain and horror in response to attack.

byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and ADAM NAGOURNEY

lead_paragraph: The Division of Environmental Health Services, whose members were at the Inland Regional Center when the shooting took place, will be closed for at least another week.

headline.main: San Bernardino County Offices Reopen After Shooting
headline.print_headline: A Struggle for Routine as County Offices Open
